title: How to get my SSLC marks card 1960 from Bangalore - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are studied in 1960 in Bangalore. Just visit SSlC board in malleshwaram and collect the application from the Relationship office at the Entrance. Fill it up and get it Sealed with your School which you studied in that time. Attach the copy of your Earlier marks card and get it attested by the School head and then Pay your fees at the Any nationalized bank and Attach the Challan to the application Submit the application to the same office at malleshwaram . Remember kindly collect ackowledgment for the same make a copy of fee payed receipt. And leave for 15 Days Later on Kindly Collect your marks card in your school after so. As per my information. Fee is around 1000 Rs. And one more document required is Notary(Just confirm with official while collecting application) If you are in hurry to get marks card .Just bribe the Officialy in the office to get it done fast. As some times you may get Marks card to your hand if you are lucky. Remember to get Sealed from School after getting marks card then only it will be valid .
